description: Initiation Plan for Programme of Support to the National Statistical System in the Lao PDR

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: This initiation plan (IP) aims to support the Government of the Lao PDR to implement critical activities for the Development of the National Statistical System while a more comprehensive project is being developed.
donor_long: GUANGXI STORA ENSO FORESTRY CO LTD
subproject.title: Initiation Plan_Statistics
